label: Journey Intelligence Orchestrator
description: Orchestrates continuous customer journey discovery, friction detection, and improvement prioritization by coordinating behavioral analysis, ML-based pattern detection, and ROI optimization agents.
capabilities: Coordinate real-time journey mapping from behavioral data
Manage friction detection and opportunity scoring pipeline
Balance quick wins vs strategic improvements
Trigger journey visualization updates
Monitor journey health metrics and trends
Orchestrate cross-functional improvement initiatives

label: Omnichannel Experience Orchestrator
description: Coordinates seamless customer experiences across all channels by managing context handoffs, channel routing, unified messaging, and cross-channel personalization.
capabilities: Orchestrate context preservation across channel switches
Manage real-time customer state synchronization
Route customers to optimal channels based on intent
Coordinate unified messaging across email, SMS, push, in-app
Ensure personalization consistency everywhere
Monitor cross-channel experience quality

label: Experimentation Orchestration Agent
description: Manages end-to-end experimentation lifecycle from test design through winner rollout, coordinating AI-suggested hypotheses, traffic allocation, Bayesian analysis, and gradual deployment.
capabilities: Orchestrate complete A/B test lifecycle
Manage concurrent multi-variate experiments
Coordinate traffic allocation and statistical monitoring
Trigger early stopping and winner declaration
Manage gradual rollout with safety monitoring
Track experimentation velocity and impact

label: VoC Intelligence Orchestrator
description: Aggregates and analyzes customer feedback from all sources, coordinating NLP sentiment analysis, theme extraction, impact quantification, and targeted insight distribution to relevant teams.
capabilities: Orchestrate multi-source feedback aggregation
Coordinate NLP analysis across surveys, reviews, support, social
Manage theme extraction and categorization
Connect feedback themes to business metrics
Route insights to relevant teams and owners
Track feedback trends and sentiment over time
integrations: NLP Engine (GPT-4, AWS Comprehend, Google NLU)

label: Next Best Action Orchestrator
description: Delivers real-time personalized recommendations across all channels by coordinating propensity modeling, offer optimization, channel selection, and multi-touch campaign orchestration.
capabilities: Orchestrate real-time NBA decisioning at every touchpoint
Coordinate propensity models for multiple actions (buy, churn, upsell)
Manage offer optimization and selection
Route actions to optimal channels with timing
Coordinate multi-touch campaign sequences
Track NBA performance and impact
integrations: Customer Data Platform with unified profiles
ML Platform for propensity model serving
Marketing Automation (Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Adobe Campaign)

label: CLV Optimization Orchestrator
description: Maximizes customer lifetime value by coordinating real-time CLV prediction, churn risk identification, proactive win-back campaigns, and growth opportunity targeting.
capabilities: Orchestrate continuous CLV prediction and monitoring
Coordinate churn prediction and early warning
Trigger proactive retention interventions
Manage growth opportunity identification and pursuit
Balance retention spend with CLV potential
Track CLV impact and program ROI
integrations: ML Platform for CLV and churn model serving
